message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it would be very beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I'm still a bit above my budget, how about we meet at $95? I really think this product would be a great fit for me.
